send_deposit:
Send a screenshot of your deposit to get access.

⚡️ Important: The screenshot must show your balance or the 1win logo.
instruction_text:
🤖 *JetSignal* — your personal assistant for maximizing profit on 1WIN!

⚡️ The bot is built on advanced OpenAI neural networks.  
📊 Over *15,000 real games* were analyzed and played to train it!

💰 _Real users of the bot consistently earn +15-25% to their deposit daily!_

*Current signal accuracy*: *up to 92%*  
The bot continues to learn and gets even smarter!

*How to get access and earn:*

🟢 *1. Register a new 1WIN account:*  
[Open 1WIN](https://1wmndv.life/v3/2158/1win-mines?p=0ujs)  
_If the site does not open — use a VPN (Sweden: VPNIFY, Planet VPN, etc.)._

❗️*Without a new registration and promo code, access to signals is not granted!*

🟢 *2. Be sure to enter the promo code during registration:*  
`PENK1WIN`

🟢 *3. Top up your balance from 500₽*  
— Only then will all signals become available!

🟢 *4. Return to the bot and press “I Registered”*  
— Follow further prompts in the menu.

*How to use the signals:*

1. *Launch the MINES or CRYSTALS mini-app via bot commands or menu.*
2. *Select the required mode and number of mines/crystals, as recommended by the bot.*
3. *Bet using the signals and increase your profit.*

🟡 _Tip:_ If the signal didn't win, just double your bet on the next signal (x2 strategy). That way you can cover any losses!

🚀 *Join those already earning with JetSignal!*
*Use only new accounts and quality screenshots — then the full functionality will be unlocked.*

*Ready to start? Click “Register” in the menu!*
instruction_text_register:
🔥 To get the most out of this bot, please follow these steps:

1. Register a new account on the 1WIN website
2. Enter the promo code: PENK1WIN
3. Top up your balance with at least 500₽

After that, click the button below 👇
ocr_access_granted: ✅ Access granted! All features are now available.
ocr_no_deposit: ❌ No deposit detected on the screenshot. Please make sure your balance or logo is visible and resend.
ocr_error: ❌ Failed to process the screenshot. Please try again.
select_mode: Choose a mode (mini-apps will open in WebApp):
admin_access_opened: ✅ Access opened! Use the buttons to play.
